attributes.action: Scrap TV Licence in Scotland apologise for broadcast of unionist guff. bbcqt
attributes.additional_details:
Broadcasts programs to portray a false narrative of of the thoughts of it's citizens in regards to the constitutional status of the Nation of Scotland. Prime example being bbc Question Time (Motherwell).

Broadcast on Thursday 7th February.  Featured a guest/audience member who has appeared three or four times, each time given time to spout false unionist platitudes.
attributes.background: Scotland has repeatedly been lied to. Told to vote no to protect our place in Europe. Misguidedly votes no. Votes to remain in Europe. Is being dragged out of Europe by the British anyway.
